entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning and ending late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
